Name: The Catacombs of Solaris Revisited
About the game: This is an enhanced edition of the beloved 2016 art game The Catacombs of Solaris, a perspective maze that plays with your perception of 3D space on a 2D screen. Compared to the original, it features a host of perplexing new visual effects, the ability to load your own images, and built-in screen capture. Note that this is a purely visual experience and contains no audio.
